rules_text:
Break [i](When this creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one other target creature.)[/i]
Whenever you put one or more +1/+1 counters on a creature you control without +1/+1 counters on it, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.
notes:
2.2.0: With the break buff, doesn’t need any fanciness.
2.2.1: Lost the evasiveness for a counter ping.
Old flavor text: I see a weak point! Blast it from range and let's put THEM in a corner!
